page.title: 07TOWN MAYORS
page.content:
Tewkesbury has been classed as a'Gem Town',one of only 51 in the country,but despite this the children asked the mayor if there were any things he did not like about Tewkesbury.The mayor felt the new shopping precinct was out of character and that it would be an improvement if the amount of traffic travelling through the town could be lessened.It was stated that Tewkesbury would retain its character as the majority of its buildings were listed.
The present mayor sees his position as a great honour.He enjoys his work and does not regret in any way being elected.
